products.title: Splash Scarlett Roller Blind
products.description: This slightly textured, dim-out fabric will bring a splash of colour to an interior. Available in many colours and blackout options available in the bella range. Splash scarlett roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
